functionality.name: Admin New Menu
functionality.description: A feature for administrators to create and manage weekly menus, customize meals and mark holidays.

requirements.description: The system must allow administrators to create a new menu for a selected week.
The system must provide options to specify dish categories and assign meals for each day.
The system must enable marking specific days as holidays, where menu options are not required.
The system must allow administrators to enter detailed meal descriptions for each dish type.
The system must display a confirmation popup once the menu is saved, showing its availability date for users.
The system must provide 'Save' and 'Cancel' buttons to manage the menu creation process.

epics.description: Enable menu creation for a specific week.

user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to create a menu for a specific week to plan meals in advance.

tasks.description: Design the UI for selecting a week and initializing a new menu.
Add backend logic for saving weekly menus.

user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to navigate easily between weeks to ensure menu consistency.

tasks.description: Implement navigation controls for moving between weeks.

epics.description: Provide options to customize and categorize meals.

user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to select dish categories and enter meal options for each type to provide variety.

tasks.description: Add input fields for dish categories and meal descriptions.
Implement logic for adding and removing dish options.

user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to quickly update the menu details for each day of the week to make changes efficiently.

tasks.description: Add editing option to modify daily menu details.

epics.description: Allow marking holidays in the menu schedule.

user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to mark certain days as holidays so no meals are planned for those days.

tasks.description: Add a checkbox for marking a day as a holiday.
Ensure holiday markers disable input fields for the respective day.

epics.description: Implement feedback for successful menu creation.

user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to receive confirmation after saving the menu to verify it was successfully created.

tasks.description: Add backend logic to confirm and display menu availability dates.
Implement frontend feedback for the save and cancel actions.
